description:
---
language:
- zh
library_name: transformers
pipeline_tag: text2text-generation
---

```python
from transformers import AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained("svjack/squad_gen_qst_zh_v0")

model = AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM.from_pretrained("svjack/squad_gen_qst_zh_v0")

tokenizer.decode(
model.generate(
    tokenizer.encode(
            "川普是美利坚共和国的总统，并在56岁时获得该奖项。｜美利坚", 
        return_tensors="pt", add_special_tokens=True
        ))[0],
skip_special_tokens = True
)

'''
'川普在哪个国家当总统?'
'''
```
